title: Google\Cloud\Security\PrivateCA\V1\CaPool\IssuancePolicy\AllowedKeyType\RsaKeyType
name: RsaKeyType
description:
Describes an RSA key that may be used in a [Certificate][google.cloud.security.privateca.v1.Certificate] issued from a [CaPool][google.cloud.security.privateca.v1.CaPool].

Generated from protobuf message google.cloud.security.privateca.v1.CaPool.IssuancePolicy.AllowedKeyType.RsaKeyType

Extends Google\Protobuf\Internal\Message

params.name: data
params.description: Optional. Data for populating the Message object.

params.name: data.min_modulus_size
params.description: Optional. The minimum allowed RSA modulus size (inclusive), in bits. If this is not set, or if set to zero, the service-level min RSA modulus size will continue to apply.

params.name: data.max_modulus_size
params.description: Optional. The maximum allowed RSA modulus size (inclusive), in bits. If this is not set, or if set to zero, the service will not enforce an explicit upper bound on RSA modulus sizes.
